name: Scarlett's Dungeon
description: Scarlett's Dungeon is an action RPG zelda-like game with randomly generated dungeons and a tribute to the 8-bit/16-bit era through it's visuals and sounds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 47 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 47 MB available space
